Perceptor::

"Sit down, Bullet" said Perceptor "I heard that you're weak and this 
might be a large chat."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Hearing Perceptors claim to second in command caused Bullet to 
automatically respect this bot.
> 
> He quickly transformed to bot mode and snapped to attention. He was 
still weak and it took almost everything he had to assume the 
position. "My names Bullet sir. Function doorkicker sir." The bull 
knew that if he was in trouble now would be when he found out. His 
anger subsided and there only remained attention for this one bot.
> 
> Charon/Deepfear/Underground/SharpClaws/Perceptor::
> 
> The moles leaded Bullet towards Perceptor's office. they come in 
and 
> Perceptor could felt Bullet's anger, yesss he could be a wonderfull 
> warrior.
> 
> "well" sait Perceptor while they came in and the door closed; 
> Perceptor said to Bullet "I'm Perceptor, second in rank... I hope 
> that you felt better now... what're your name?"
